comment.body: great @erkan, you put me under pressure ^^
yes @musickiller and it could be usefull if you install ZeroNet on an unencrypted machine. Stolen, this machine could give access to your keys and then your sites.

yes @ks I think about all these tools. In fact, ZeroNet is not just a tool, it's a toolbox :-)

Random port would be better to avoid censorship, but is it possible for instances to discover other instances ports ? if they publish their port to others at launch maybe ??

ouch, magical !

I didn't know gnuroot for Android. Thanks, I will try it.
